thread.title: A Gem in the Middle of Times Square
thread.title_full: A Gem in the Middle of Times Square - Review of Casablanca Hotel by Library Hotel Collection, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Charles F
title: A Gem in the Middle of Times Square
text: If you like Boutique Hotels, your going to love this one. A step back in time right in the middle of New York City. The hotel is very clean and the entire experience with them was great. They are very helpful with anything you may need and knowledgeable about the city. Great staff, great hotel..
